verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G1919><s%> earthly <S%G1919><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> our tent <S%G4636><s%> is dissolved, <S%G2647><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> a building <S%G3619><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%> not made with hands, <S%G886><s%> eternal, <S%G166><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> most certainly <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> we groan, <S%G4727><s%> longing <S%G1971><s%> to be clothed <S%G1902><s%> with our <S%G2257><s%> habitation <S%G3613><s%> which is from <S%G1537><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%>
if <S%G1489><s%> so be that <S%G2532><s%> being clothed <S%G1746><s%> we will <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> naked. <S%G1131><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> indeed <S%G2532><s%> we who are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this tent <S%G4636><s%> do groan, <S%G4727><s%> being burdened; <S%G916><s%> not <S%G2309><s%> that <S%G3756><s%> we desire <S%G1562><s%> to be unclothed, <S%G235><s%> but <S%G1902><s%> that <S%G2666><s%> we desire to be clothed, <S%G2443><s%> that <S%G2666><s%> what is mortal <S%G5259><s%> may be swallowed up <S%G2222><s%> by life. <S%G2222><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> made <S%G2716><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this very <S%G846><s%> thing <S%G5124><s%> is God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> the down payment <S%G728><s%> of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> we are always <S%G3842><s%> confident <S%G2292><s%> and know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> while <S%G2532><s%> we are at home <S%G1736><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> we are absent <S%G1553><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

We are courageous, <S%G2292><s%> I say, <S%G2532><s%> and are willing <S%G2106><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to be absent <S%G1553><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be at home <S%G1736><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> also we make it our aim, <S%G5389><s%> <S%G2532><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> at home <S%G1736><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> absent, <S%G1553><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> well pleasing <S%G2101><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> be revealed <S%G5319><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> may receive <S%G2865><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> according <S%G4314><s%> to what <S%G3739><s%> he has done, <S%G4238><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> bad. <S%G2556><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> we persuade <S%G3982><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> we are revealed <S%G5319><s%> to God; <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> that we are revealed <S%G5319><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consciences. <S%G4893><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we are not <S%G3756><s%> commending <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> but <S%G235><s%> speak as giving <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> of boasting <S%G2745><s%> on our <S%G2257><s%> behalf, <S%G5228><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may have <S%G2192><s%> something to <S%G4314><s%> answer those <S%G3588><s%> who boast <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> appearance, <S%G4383><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in heart. <S%G2588><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1535><s%> we are beside ourselves, <S%G1839><s%> it is for God. <S%G2316><s%> Or if <S%G1535><s%> we are of sober <S%G4993><s%> mind, <S%G5213><s%> it is for you.

For <S%G1063><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> constrains <S%G4912><s%> us; <S%G2248><s%> because <S%G5124><s%> we judge <S%G2919><s%> thus, <S%G3754><s%> that <S%G1487><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G599><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who live <S%G2198><s%> should <S%G2198><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to him <S%G3588><s%> who for <S%G5228><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sakes died <S%G599><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rose again. <S%G1453><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G575><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> from now on. <S%G3568><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1487><s%> we have known <S%G1097><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> we <S%G1097><s%> know him so no more. <S%G3765><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he is a new <S%G2537><s%> creation. <S%G2937><s%> The old things <S%G744><s%> have passed away. <S%G3928><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> have become <S%G1096><s%> new. <S%G2537><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are of <S%G1537><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> reconciled <S%G2644><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of reconciliation; <S%G2643><s%>

namely, <S%G5613><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> reconciling <S%G2644><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> reckoning <S%G3049><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> their <S%G846><s%> trespasses, <S%G3900><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having committed <S%G5087><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of reconciliation. <S%G2643><s%>

We are therefore <S%G3767><s%> ambassadors <S%G4243><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> were entreating <S%G3870><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> us: <S%G2257><s%> we beg <S%G1189><s%> you on <S%G5228><s%> behalf <S%G5547><s%> of Christ, <S%G2644><s%> be reconciled to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> him <S%G4160><s%> who knew <S%G1097><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> he made to be sin <S%G266><s%> on our <S%G2257><s%> behalf; <S%G5228><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
